teal.render.viewer

Interface TBehaviorManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TransformChangeListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BehaviorManager

    public interface TBehaviorManager
extends TransformChangeListener
    An interface to the manager for all behavior classes resposible for processing all viewer mouse events. It should be possible to provide default handlers for each of the types of behavior processing that needs to be done, or to be able to specify handlers for Pick, Translate, Rotate & Zoom.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int INVERT_INPUT
      Set this flag if you want to invert the inputs.

    • Field Detail

      • INVERT_INPUT

        static final int INVERT_INPUT
        Set this flag if you want to invert the inputs. This is useful when the transform for the view platform is being changed instead of the transform for the object.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
